title: Create COMPANY-has-prime-image Relationship
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to select one image to be used as prime image for a COMPANY\
So the node can be represented as good as possible in any frontend application
description:
* The relationship ›has-prime-image‹ is created when the provided IDs of the COMPANY and IMAGE are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship and the IDs of both nodes.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›has-prime-image‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* At the same time a COMPANY can only be in a ›has-prime-image‹ relationship with one IMAGE
